patterns: What can I do to feel better?
How can I improve my mental health?
What are some ways to manage stress?
responses: There are many things you can do to improve your mental health. Some things that might help include exercise, meditation, getting enough sleep, and talking to a therapist or counselor. What works best for you may depend on your individual needs and preferences.

patterns: Are there any mental health resources available?
Where can I find help for my mental health?
Are there any support groups for mental health?
